runs.comm: on target, lands on a good length on the off, Vijay plays that off the back foot towards the bowler
short of a good length on the off, defended off the back foot to extra cover
getting it to shape away from the right hander, Vijay shoulders arms to that one
short of a good length outside off, punched off the back foot to point
short on middle, shapes up for the pull, tries to clear midwicket, just about manages to do so, didn't get hold of it but is lucky to get a couple
a snorter from Nannes, and Vijay had no answer as it zipped away to beat the outside edge, Haddin took it in front of his pace, excellent bounce
starts with a full and wide delivery, Gambhir slices it past a diving point to beat third man to the boundary
short of a good length outside off, opens the face and drops it towards backward point
banged it short on leg stump, Gambhir took his eyes off it while trying it play it into the leg side, got a bit of a top edge to evade the keeper and a diving fine leg, a streaky boundary
bangs it short again, Gambhir plays it well, trying to get on top of it and knocking it down into the leg side
slower one bowled from slightly wide of the crease, tickled towards square leg
a quick bouncer, Gambhir is in his crease and tries to hook that behind square, can't connect, too quick

Vijay gets the leading edge and is caught, got to him quick, short of a good length outside off and he tried to turn the face and gifted a simple catch to White at cover, it was angling away and he chose the wrong shot
fires it full on middle, pushed towards midwicket
short of a good length on middle, worked off the back foot behind square for a single
moving in from a good length pushed it back past the bowler to mid-on
short of a good length, tries to pull it square, mistimes it
gone! Gambhir mistimes again and finds the fielder, 146 kmph and it was quicker than he might have liked, shaped up to play the pull, gets it high on the bat and it lobs up straight towards midwicket
shortish outside off, trying to angle it away from Raina, guided towards backward point
bouncer banged in on middle, Raina ducks, it's too high and is called a wide
short of a good length on the off, defended towards point from the crease
too quick for Raina as he tries to pull that but works in his favour, gets a top edge over the keeper's head for a boundary

India in trouble now, another short delivery and he tries to pull that over square leg, the Australians are getting good bounce and are putting in the effort, got the top edge again and both Clarke, running in from cover, and the Warner called for it, they collided but Clarke still held on close to the stumps
short and wide, shapes to cut, misses
angling it towards middle and leg, turned towards midwicket
full outside off, steered towards third man for a single
short of a good length outside off, defended off the back foot towards point
Rohit is away, bowls it on a good length on middle, drags it wide of mid-on for a boundary
Nannes bowls from slightly wide of the crease, pitches it on a good length, tries to drive it through extra cover, misses
closes the face, gets across and turns it through midwicket for a single

bowled'im! Aiming for the blockhole and gets it right, sliding on leg stump, Yuvraj tries to work it through the leg side, misses, it clips the pads and brushes the off stump to leave India in further trouble
trying to probe him outside off, gets forward and defends it to extra cover
short on middle, tries to pull it hard through square leg, gets an inside edge onto his thighs
bangs it short outside off, Rohit moves away, tries to upper cut it over the keeper, misses
slower one bowled short outside off, cut down towards third man for a single
gets front and across and pushes it towards mid-on
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defended into the leg side
swing and a miss, fullish outside off, tries to swing him over midwicket, misses, just escapes the off stump
short on middle, pulled behind square for a couple wide of fine leg
short outside off, plays it really late, gets a thick outside edge towards third man for a single
shortish outside off, Dhoni tries to cut that through point, misses
wide called, shortish but well wide of the right hander
short outside off, slapped off the back foot towards deep cover for a single
That's disappeared, short on middle and Rohit is in position to dispatch it, rocks back and pulls it hard over deep midwicket
bowls it flat and full on middle, pushed back to the bowler
slightly wide of the crease, holds its line, gets forward and pushes it back
full, worked away through midwicket for a single
low full toss on middle, pushed down the ground to long-on
Dhoni holes out! Bowled flat, lands full on middle, Dhoni comes down the track and smacks it hard but doesn't get much elevation, sends it straight into the palms of David Hussey at long-on
short outside off, chopped towards point
bowls it on a good length outside off, guides it down to third man for a single
bouncer, too short outside off, tries to upper cut it over the keeper, misses
short down the leg side and is called by the umpire this time
fuller outside off, Yusuf's eyes light up, tries to smash him over mid-off, misses
full and wide, targets extra cover this time but again can't make any contact
short outside off, chops it towards third man for a single
pushed uppishly through cover into the deep for a single

well taken by Warner, Yusuf mistimed that one, was full outside off and it appeared he was trying to clear extra cover, ended up slicing it over point and Warner, running in from point, dived forward and grabbed an excellent low catch, Australia are all over India
pushed off the front foot through midwicket for a single
comes down the track and pushes it wide of long-on for a single
low full toss outside off, driven through the line to long-off
short on middle, turns away, moves away and cuts it wide of deep point for a single
full toss outside off, drilled towards long-off for a single
defended wide of extra cover off the front foot, thinks of a single but it's not there
shortish outside off, swats it towards long-off for a single
there is no mid-on, had he been there he would have caught that with ease, slower one bowled short, another mistimed pull, just the single
bouncer, doesn't connect on the hook, missed, called a wide
run-out, slaps it to mid-on and takes off for a single, David Hussey picks and hurls an accurate throw at the non-striker's end, Jadeja is well short, what a terrible game he's had
Paddle-scoop for six, bowled on a good length on middle and leg and he plays it well enough to clear the fine-leg boundary
slower one bowled short outside off, run towards short third man
short and he bisects the gap, moves away and pulls it between long-on and deep midwicket for a boundary
shortish, gets a thick outside edge to third man for a single
slower one bowled on middle and leg, moves away and defends it to cover
full and wide, too wide and is called by the umpire
banged in short on middle, again mistimes a pull, lands safely and they come back for the second
yorker on the pads, gets an inside edge behind square for a single
short on middle and leg, Harbhajan moves well across to work it fine, there is a deviation on the way to the keeper, flicks the shirt
slower one bowled full on middle, turned away towards midwicket
full on the off stump, steers it towards deep point for a single
short on the off, tries to pull him over square leg, misses
full outside off, makes room and slices it over point for a couple of runs
nicely struck, short and he shaped up for the pull, striking it after moving back over midwicket for a boundary
tries to swing a slower one in the same direction, doesn't connect this time
tries to force it through the on side, is struck on the thigh, Rohit calls for a single and Harbhajan responds
sliding it down the leg side, tries to sweep it fine, misses
lands on a length, comes down the track and launches him over long-off for a well-struck six
flighted on middle, came down the track and struck it inside out towards extra cover
stretches forward and turns it through midwicket for a couple more
made a bit of room this time while simultaneously coming down the track, smashes it hard over wide long-off for another six
pushed gently through cover to bring up a hard-fought half-century
drilled back to the bowler who reacts well to stop it
slower one, moves well across and flicks it towards short fine leg for a single
smash, Harbhajan goes for the hook despite the extra bounce, connects well to send it sailing over midwicket
gone this time, another flatbat shot to a short ball, hits low on the bat, not enough power, the ball swirls to mid-off where David Hussey snaffles it
the hundred is up for India, top-edged over the keeper's head, nearly a six
much more convincing hit from Rohit this time, length ball outside off, hammered over long-off for six, fielder though he had a chance for a bit, but the ball clears the ropes
looks to paddle this one, is hit on the pads outside leg
another six, all of which will help India if it comes down to net run-rate, Zaheer bends his knee and plonks the ball over wide long-on
shortish ball, pitching around off, spins away from Zaheer, who dabs the ball towards third man
driven firmly down to long-on for a single
well outside off, Rohit reaches across to tap it towards sweeper cover
played with soft hands towards cover, wants the single but is sent back by Rohit
full and wide, Rohit doesn't hit it as well as he would have liked, luckily for him mid-off was in the circle, ball clears him
another unconvincing shot, down the track and looking to slog towards long-on, but outside edge past keeper for four
best shot of the over, backing away and carves the back of length ball between backward point and cover
correction, this is the best shot of the over, overpitched by Nannes, Rohit clobbers it over long-on for a big six, Sharma has raced to 76
shortish ball angling across the batsman, Rohit looks to swipe it to midwicket but doesn't connect
this time he connects with a similar stroke, gets t away to midwicket for a single to retain strike
a yorker on middle, punched back towards the bowler, just past Tait, single taken off a ricochet  off throw at non-striker's end
Zaheer's gone this time, short ball does the job, looks for a cross-batted hit, only top-edges it towards mid-off
fast and wide down the leg side
worked away towards fine leg for a single, can the No. 11 survive the two deliveries of this over?

no he can't, a yorker that was much too good for him crashes into the base of middle stump, Australia win by 49 runs, a massive margin in Twenty20s, no doubting who the favourites for the title are now
